name: requestCandidates(forSelectedRange:in:types:options:inSpellDocumentWithTag:completionHandler:)
declaration:

                    in stringToCheck: String, 
                 types checkingTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes, 
               options: [NSSpellChecker.OptionKey : Any]? = nil, 
inSpellDocumentWithTag tag: Int, 
     completionHandler: ((Int, [NSTextCheckingResult]) -> Void)? = nil) -> Int
